verses.verse: Then the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> Jehoahaz <S%H3059><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Josiah <S%H2977><s%>, and made him king <S%H4427><s%> in his father <S%H1><s%>'s stead in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

Moreover all the chiefs <S%H8269><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%>, and the people <S%H5971><s%>, trespassed <S%H4603><s%> very <S%H4604><s%> greatly <S%H7235><s%> after all the abominations <S%H8441><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%>; and they polluted <S%H2930><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> which he had hallowed <S%H6942><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, sent <S%H7971><s%> to them by <S%H3027><s%> his messengers <S%H4397><s%>, rising up early <S%H7925><s%> and sending <S%H7971><s%>, because he had compassion <S%H2550><s%> on his people <S%H5971><s%>, and on his dwelling-place <S%H4583><s%>:

Therefore he brought <S%H5927><s%> upon them the king <S%H4428><s%> of the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%>, who slew <S%H2026><s%> their young men <S%H970><s%> with the sword <S%H2719><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of their sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>, and had no compassion <S%H2550><s%> upon young man <S%H970><s%> or virgin <S%H1330><s%>, old man <S%H2205><s%> or hoary-headed <S%H3486><s%>: he gave <S%H5414><s%> them all into his hand <S%H3027><s%>.
